description:
Allows you to change the BGM from Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden to music that evokes the memory of the androids who fought to the death for the sake of humanity.
*The appearance will not change in some sections.
*This content is also available for sale as part of a set. Please take care not to re-purchase the same products.
name: Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden Resistance Jukebox
